Smell Description: Task violates idempotency because it installs packages with dnf.
Task uses dnf to install a latest version which could get incompatible.
The installed package could become outdated because the script does not update it.
Task violates idempotency because it executes a command.
Task did not check the correctness of execution.
Task changes the state of the file without checking.
Task did not check the correctness of execution.
